settings.heading: Get in Touch
settings.subheading: Questions about shades, routines, or orders? We're here to help you glow.

settings.heading: Ways to Reach Us
settings.subheading: Choose the method that works best for you

settings.heading: Send Us a Message
settings.subheading: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible

settings.question: What are your shipping times?
settings.answer: We ship orders within 1-2 business days. Delivery typically takes 3-5 business days for domestic orders and 7-14 days for international orders.

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for unopened products. If you're not satisfied, contact us within 30 days of delivery for a full refund.

settings.question: How do I find my perfect shade?
settings.answer: Use our Shade Finder Quiz on the homepage, or contact our beauty experts who can provide personalized recommendations based on your skin tone and undertone.

settings.question: Are your products cruelty-free?
settings.answer: Yes! All our products are 100% cruelty-free and vegan. We never test on animals and use only ethically sourced ingredients.

settings.question: Do you offer wholesale pricing?
settings.answer: Yes, we offer wholesale pricing for salons, spas, and retailers. Please contact us at wholesale@auracosmetics.com for more information.

settings.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.subheading: Find quick answers to common questions
